name: Trashy Romcom Publisher Simulator
description:
Made by Aaron Kuthoor, Erna Balayan, Noah Matheu, and Miles Esguerra. 

This was a proof-of-concept project where you play as a publisher in charge of a company that focuses on romance. 

The game is styled like a computer with 4 functions: Email, Screecher (Our version of Twitter), Send, and Trash.  Email allows you to receive drafts of potential books which are accompanied by an email from the author.  Screecher shows the public's reaction to the published books. Send publishes the draft and Trash deletes the draft.

You publish or trash drafts by dragging the relevant window into either function. 

The proof of concept is meant to show the humor and function of the game. There is no real end state but there is a decent amount of emails and screeches within the game.

We hope you enjoy it!
